verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> or <S%H7892>Song<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah.<s%> His <S%H3248>foundation<s%> is in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2042>mountains.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> more than <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
<S%H3513>Glorious<s%> things are <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of you, O <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

I will make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of <S%H7294>Rahab<s%> and <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to them that <S%H3045>know<s%> me: <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H6429>Philistia,<s%> and <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> with <S%H3568>Ethiopia;<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> man was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said,<s%> This and that <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> in her: and the <S%H5945>highest<s%> <S%H1931>himself<s%> shall <S%H3559>establish<s%> her.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5608>count,<s%> when he <S%H3789>writes<s%> up the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that <S%H2088>this<s%> man was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
As well the <S%H7891>singers<s%> as the <S%H2490>players<s%> on instruments shall be there: <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4599>springs<s%> are in you.
